channel.title: [Delta] Having trouble converting this section of an old snippet
channel.description:
I've been testing out summonednpcs and found an old tutorial, but while I was converting it I ran into a section that obviously has been renamed.
The full section: [code]} else if (distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 10 && kara == playerName) {[/code] What I'm having trouble converting: [code]kara[/code] [code]distanceToPoint[/code]
I'm thinking distanceToPoint is GoodDistance, but I'm not sure, and as for Kara, I have no idea...

item.title: [Delta] Having trouble converting this section of an old snippet
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

Oh wow, I need to apologize. I wasn’t even paying attention when I posted this…
I left out far too much code.

[code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 10 && person.kara == person.playerName) {
if (npcs[i].npcType == 155)
{

}
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 10 && person.kara == person.playerName) {
if (npcs[i].npcType == 155)
{
newSummonedNPC(155, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(155), false, playerId);
npcs[i].IsDead = true;

}
}
}
}
}[/code]

I messed around with the line you provided and I failed to get it to work. Sorry >_<.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Having trouble converting this section of an old snippet

if (!c.goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, c.absX, c.absY, 9)) {
